item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: DCesv6, DCedsv6, ECesv6, and ECedsv6 confidential VMs
item.description:
Azure announced general availability of the DCesv6, DCedsv6, ECesv6, and ECedsv6 confidential VM series based on 5th Gen Intel Xeon processors with Intel Trust Domain Extensions (TDX).

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [In preview] Private Preview: DCesv6 and ECesv6 series confidential VMs with IntelÂ® TDX
item.description:
Azure has introduced the DCesv6 and ECesv6 series Confidential VMs powered by 5th Gen Intel Xeon processors with Intel TDX for enhanced security.

  • Source: Azure Updates
